location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of the frontier between Iraq and Syria

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: On sheet 1428 x 1049mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the area around the frontier between Iraq and Syria, it includes five green lines, with a key indicating that they represent the frontier according to the following: the French and Syrian Assessors; the British and Iraqi Assessors; the Commission of Enquiry; the majority; and the minority. The map includes a key (in French) indicating various features such as settlements, and the map also includes form lines and hachures, and hydrology is indicated. The map was published by the Topographical Bureau of the Forces in the Levant. Most of the text on the map is in French.
